title: 88/263/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 April 1988 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Basilicata) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 April 1988
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Italy (Basilicata) pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(88/263/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The provisions implementing Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 in the subject of Resolution No 404 of 20 October 1987 of the Region of Basilicata, which were forwarded by the Italian Government on 23 November 1987, satisfy the conditions governing a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure referred to in Article 1 of the said Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 April 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
